itemInfo.itemDesc:
Seafood roasted with butter. 
- Unique effect: Attack Speed Rank +1 for 30min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Butter
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be created by Shaking salt with the cream obtained from Shaking milk.\n\n- Usage: Cheese Pie, Seafood Grilled with Butter

item.name: Squid
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Seafood Pasta, Stir Fried Seafood, Seafood Mushroom Salad, etc.

item.name: Butter
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be created by Shaking salt with the cream obtained from Shaking milk.\n\n- Usage: Cheese Pie, Seafood Grilled with Butter

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Olive Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
